description: Create a new Xray Cloud Test Plan in Jira/Xray using a summary, description, optional JQL for test selection, optional context key-value data, and optional custom fields. Returns the created issue key/id and a direct link.

context.description: Contextual key-value data that influences test behavior and execution (runtime parameters, environment values, dynamic overrides).

customFields.description: Optional Jira/Xray custom field values to set during creation. Each entry defines a single custom field by its name/key and a value.

name.description: The custom field name or key as defined in Jira/Xray (for example, 'Test Level' or 'cf_12345').

value.description: The value to assign to the custom field.

description.description: Detailed description for the Test Plan.

jql.description: Optional JQL used to define/select the tests included in the Test Plan (if supported by your workflow).

project.description: Jira project key in which the Test Plan will be created (for example, 'QA' or 'PROJ').

summary.description: Short human-readable title for the Test Plan.

name: new_xray_test_plan

id.description: Created Test Plan internal identifier (Jira issue id).

link.description: Direct URL to the created Test Plan in Jira/Xray.
